mapper.insert: insert into industry_user (username, password, registertime, phone, lastip, name, user_type) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update industry_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registertime = #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastip = #{lastip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, registertime, phone, lastip, name, user_type from industry_user
